titles: The defence of the article: Christ descended into Hell VVith arguments obiected against the truth of the same doctrine: of one Alexander Humes. All which reasons are confuted, and the same doctrine cleerely defended. By Adam Hyll, D. of Diuinity.
author: Hill, Adam, d. 1595.
Hume, Alexander, schoolmaster.
publisher: Printed [by John Windet] for William Ponsonbie,
notes: A reply to Alexander Hume's answer to Hill's sermon "Christ descended into Hell", with the sermon and the answer.
The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A".
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University. Library.
keywords: Hume, Alexander, --  schoolmaster --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
Jesus Christ --  Descent into hell --  Early works to 1800.
